faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our venue and services
faq.sectionSubtitle: Get answers to the most common questions about our venue, policies, and services
faq.contactDescription: Our team is here to help you plan the perfect event. Contact us for personalized assistance.
faq.bookDescription: Don't wait - our calendar fills up quickly! Secure your date today and let us help you create an unforgettable celebration.

questions.question: Is parking available?
questions.answer: Yes, There are more than 70 Free parking spots available both in front and behind the Slice venue on the property.

questions.question: What is required to book my event date?
questions.answer: We require a deposit of one-third down of the estimated bill. This deposit is due at the signing of the function agreement to secure your date.

questions.question: Do you have security?
questions.answer: Mandatory Security is required for all events additional fee is required.

questions.question: What restrictions are there on decorations?
questions.answer: Decorations are permitted. Item may be affixed to the walls of the Premises with specific permission by staff and using specified material Glitter, confetti, rice, sparklers are not permitted. Candles must be confined within a glass container and flames must be below rim.

questions.question: Is your space accessible to the disabled?
questions.answer: There are handicap parking up front of the venue and large accessible restrooms.

questions.question: How much time do I have to set up and breakdown décor?
questions.answer: Set up time for your event will be determined by the Event Manager. Access is typically two hours prior to the event. One hour after the stated event time is allocated for vendor breakdown.

questions.question: Are there restrictions on outside vendors?
questions.answer: Bar are in house only. You may use any other vendor for other services including Catering as long as the vendor carries liability insurance.

allInclusive.description: Everything you need is included - from premium furniture and lighting to professional catering and bar services. No hidden fees, no surprises.

modernLuxury.description: State-of-the-art venue with club-style atmosphere, LED lighting, professional sound systems, and flexible layouts for any event size.

venueShowcase.title: A Venue Like No Other
venueShowcase.description: SLICE Weston combines the sophistication of a high-end club with the warmth of a family-owned business. Our 220-guest capacity venue features:

features.0: Large dance floor with club lighting
features.1: Premium leather furniture and chivari chairs
features.3: Multiple seating areas and bar spaces

catering.subtitle: From gourmet appetizers to decadent desserts, our culinary team creates unforgettable dining experiences.
catering.heading: Culinary Excellence
catering.description: Our award-winning catering team brings years of experience. We specialize in creating custom menus that reflect your unique event.

eventsGallery.title: From Bar/Bat Mitzvahs to Corporate Events
eventsGallery.subtitle: Our versatile venue transforms to create the perfect atmosphere for any celebration. Whether it's a milestone birthday, corporate gathering, or special ceremony, we make every event unforgettable.

features.1: Flexible space configurations for any group size

photoGallery.title: Photo Gallery
photoGallery.clickToZoom: Click to zoom • Scroll to adjust

mayteGarcia.text: We hosted our Back to School celebration at Slice and couldn't have asked for a better experience! The venue is absolutely beautiful, the staff was incredible, and they went above and beyond to ensure it was a memorable night for everyone. We are so grateful for their hospitality and highly recommend Slice for any special event!

kalhanRaina.text: Patty is so amazing and helpful, a level of hospitality that would make you think you are having a party at her house and not an event venue. Everything is arranged beautifully and service is seamless.

alinaGonzalez.text: Patty is fantastic. She always responded quickly, offered great suggestions, and was passionate about making my birthday party special. Her staff were also very friendly and welcoming. The venue is perfect and the white couches is such a nice touch around the dance floor. I would definitely have another party here. My guests loved it too. Thank you for everything. You're an amazing host.

sarahJohnson.text: Absolutely incredible venue! The space is beautiful and Patty and her team made our daughter's quinceañera absolutely perfect. Every detail was handled with care and professionalism. Highly recommend!

michaelRodriguez.text: SLICE Weston exceeded all our expectations for our corporate event. The modern amenities, professional staff, and attention to detail made it a memorable experience for all our guests. Will definitely book again!

jenniferLee.text: Patty and her team are simply amazing! They made our wedding reception absolutely perfect. The venue is stunning, the food was delicious, and the service was impeccable. Thank you for making our special day unforgettable!

about.title: About SLICE Weston
about.subtitle: Your premier event venue in South Florida
about.description: Learn more about our story, mission, and commitment to creating unforgettable celebrations.
about.ourStoryText: The "Slice" concept was born out of the need for a great new venue in Weston and the Broward county market. At Slice, we have created a modern, clean, crisp, atmosphere unparalleled anywhere in South Florida with completely customizable options for your next "Private" event or corporate function.

experience.title: Our Passion & Experience
experience.description1: We are local South Floridians with ties to our community and the diverse cultures here in our tropical slice of heaven. Our passion is Parties.......We like to plan them, prepare amazing cuisine, and provide personal service. We are driven by the satisfaction we receive seeing our clients enjoy their events at our place.
experience.description2: Over the years, we have hosted events for clients including The Florida Marlins, Miami Dolphins players, along with International Singing Stars from Miami, Venezuela, Columbia, and Jamaica.
experience.description3: Every detail is attended to as we do the work so you can enjoy the party.

professionalExpertise.title: Professional Knowledge
professionalExpertise.description: In today's world of so many responsibilities, we pride ourselves on our knowledge of the event business and the detail to customer service that is essential to you.

investmentProtection.title: Your Investment Matters
investmentProtection.description: You are investing a lot in your event. Work with professionals that will ensure that your event is a success.

provenTrackRecord.title: Proven Track Record
provenTrackRecord.description: We have coordinated thousands of events over the past years, and we are proud to be here to host your next event.

pattyLeon.name: Patty Leon
pattyLeon.description: Patty Leon brings years of experience and passion to every event at SLICE Weston. As Director of Catering, she ensures that every detail is perfectly executed, from planning to preparation to personal service. Her dedication to creating memorable celebrations is what makes SLICE Weston the premier choice for events in South Florida.

meetOwner.title: Meet The Owner
meetOwner.subtitle: Get to know Patty Leon
meetOwner.description: Learn about the passionate owner behind SLICE Weston and her commitment to excellence.

hero.title: Meet The Owner
hero.subtitle: Patty Leon - SLICE Weston Event Venue

owner.name: Patty Leon
owner.altText: Patty Leon - Owner of SLICE Weston

story.intro: SLICE Ownership is Local, Experienced in both running and catering events, and most importantly known for their exceptional service.
story.background: Patty Leon is the principle owner and General manager of the event venue. Born and raised in Miami of Peruvian decent, she has lived in Weston Florida since the Mid 90's. She has over 12 years experience coordinating and executing events, many as the Director of Catering at a local country club. She has a passion for food, creating menus and executing events. She also has a dream to become a chef one day. Her dedication to her clients has earned her a superb reputation and a long list of satisfied and repeat clients.
story.team: She has developed a dedicated team over the years that includes; the Executive chef, sous chefs, bartenders, and server staff. This team knows every inch of the SLICE venue, which contributes, to having all SLICE events run smoothly.
story.rebirth: SLICE was Reborn in 2014 under Patty's leadership after a chance client visit to SLICE. After seeing the venue, Patty began to envision that she could bring their event expertise to such a new, ultra modern venue in Weston. The plan was put in motion after a meeting with Ken Edelman, owner of the Weston commercial center. Together they put together an agreement for Patty to take over Slice, bring her expertise and team and put life into the venue.
story.amenities: Patty and the team are constantly adding new amenities to the venue including; new lighting, added lounge furniture, additional video screens, a new white modern bar along with new menu item selections.
story.cta: We hope to see you soon at Slice Weston and look forward to the opportunity of hosting your next event.
